img.alt: Eugenio María de Hostos Charter School

div.div:
Parent Resources & Student Lessons
Our schools are now closed due to recent events related to the coronavirus. Please visit this page often to see updates, learn more about your student’s upcoming work and other resources
Please refresh this page for the latest information! [et_pb_wc_meta _builder_version=”4.4.2″][/et_pb_wc_meta]

strong.style: font-size: 16px; color: #666666; font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Do you need to contact your teacher or someone at our school? Check the staff directory. Office hours are listed below:
I-Ready reading and math (Grades K-5 students have a log in)
Zearn Math Curriculum (Grades 1-5 students have a log in)

p.a: Great Reading and Writing Practice (Grades K-5)
Practice Tests and Sample Questions for Math and English Language Arts (Grades 2-8)
A Variety of Practice Activities for Reading and Writing, grades K-10
A Variety of Practice Activities for Math, grades K-10

li.a: Online resources for parents teaching at home
EL (Expeditionary Learning) Education Coronavirus Resource Center

p.span: The social workers will continue to provide weekly resources for social-emotional support.

li.a: Free Online Art Classes with the Museum of Modern Art
The Science of Well-Being with Yale
Resources to keep your child safe (Eng)
Resources to keep your child safe (Esp)
